register.name: CR
register.description: Control Register

field.name: EDBG
field.description: Enable Debug\n Disables DMA operation in Debug mode

field.name: ERCA
field.description: Enable Round Robin Channel Arbitration\n Control arbitration for channel selection within each group

field.name: HOE
field.description: Halt On Error\n Allow all operations to suspend on any error (HALT Is set)

field.name: HALT
field.description: Halt DMA Operations\n Halt DMA at the end of current channel operations

field.name: CLM
field.description: Continuous Link Mode\n Controls whether a minor loop channel link made to itself goes through channel arbitration before being activated again

field.name: EMLM
field.description:
Enable Minor Loop Mapping
 Activates Minor Loop Mapping
 TCDn.word2 is interpreted to include individual enable fields, an offset field, and the NBYTES field.
 The individual enable fields allow the minor loop offset to be applied to the source address, the destination address, or both.
 The NBYTES field is reduced when either offset is enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Disabled\tTCDn.word2 is defined as a 32-bit NBYTES field

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Enabled\tTCDn.word2 includes individual enable fields, offset and NBYTES field

field.name: ECX
field.description:
Cancel Data Transfer and set Error
 Stop the executing channel and force the minor loop to finish.
 The cancel takes effect after the last write of the current read/write sequence.
 The CX bit clears itself after the cancel has been honoured.
 This cancel retires the channel normally as if the minor loop was completed.
 The ES register is updated and may generate an optional error interrupt

field.name: CX
field.description:
Cancel Remaining Data Transfer
 Stop the executing channel and force the minor loop to finish.
 The cancel takes effect after the last write of the current read/write sequence.
 The CX bit clears itself after the cancel has been honoured.
 This cancel retires the channel normally as if the minor loop was completed

register.name: ES
register.description: Error Status Register\n The ES provides information concerning the last recorded channel error

field.name: DBE
field.description: Destination Bus Error\n Indicates that there was a bus error on a destination write

field.name: SBE
field.description: Source Bus Error\n Indicates that there was a bus error on a source read

field.name: SGE
field.description: Scatter/Gather Configuration Error\n Indicates that there was a configuration error detected in the TCDn_DLASTSGA field

field.name: NCE
field.description: NBYTES/CITER Configuration Error\n Indicates that there was a configuration error detected in the TCDn_NBYTES or TCDn_CITER fields

field.name: DOE
field.description: Destination Offset Error\n Indicates that there was a configuration error detected in the TCDn_DOFF field

field.name: DAE
field.description: Destination Address Error\n Indicates that there was a configuration error detected in the TCDn_DADDR field

field.name: SOE
field.description: Source Offset Error\n Indicates that there was a configuration error detected in the TCDn_SOFF field

field.name: SAE
field.description: Source Address Error\n Indicates that there was a configuration error detected in the TCDn_SADDR field

field.name: CPE
field.description: Channel Priority Error\n Indicates that there was a configuration error in the channel priorities. Channel priorities are not unique (within a group)

field.name: ECX
field.description: Transfer Cancelled\n Indicates that a transfer was cancelled by the error cancel transfer input

field.name: VLD
field.description: Logical OR of all Error status bits\n Indicates that at least one ERR bit is set indicating a valid error exists that has not been cleared

register.name: ERQ
register.description: Enable Request Register\n Contains a bit to enable or disable requests from each channel

register.name: EEI
register.description: Enable Error Interrupt Register\n Contains a bit to enable or disable errors interrupts from each channel

register.name: CEEI
register.description: Clear Enable Error Interrupt Register\n Provides a simple memory-mapped mechanism to clear a given bit in the EEI to disable the error interrupt for a given channel.\n The data value on a register write causes the corresponding bit in the EEI to be cleared

register.name: SEEI
register.description: Set Enable Error Interrupt Register\n Provides a simple memory-mapped mechanism to set a given bit in the EEI to enable the error interrupt for a given channel.\n The data value on a register write causes the corresponding bit in the EEI to be set

register.name: CERQ
register.description: Clear Enable Request Register\n Provides a simple memory-mapped mechanism to clear a given bit in the ERQ to disable the DMA request from a given channel.\n The data value on a register write causes the corresponding bit in the ERQ to be cleared

register.name: SERQ
register.description:
Set Enable Request Register
 Clear Enable Request Register
 Provides a simple memory-mapped mechanism to set a given bit in the ERQ to enable the DMA request from a given channel.
 The data value on a register write causes the corresponding bit in the ERQ to be set

register.name: CDNE
register.description: Clear DONE Status Bit Register\n Provides a simple memory-mapped mechanism to clear the DONE bit in the TCD of the given channel

register.name: SSRT
register.description: Set START Bit Register\n Provides a simple memory-mapped mechanism to set the START bit in the TCD of the given channel

field.name: SAST
field.description: Set All START Bits (activates all channels)

register.name: CERR
register.description: Clear Error Register

register.name: CINT
register.description: Clear Interrupt Request Register

register.name: INT
register.description: Interrupt Request Register

register.name: ERR
register.description: Error Register

register.name: HRS
register.description: Hardware Request Status Register

register.name: EARS
register.description: Enable Asynchronous Request in Stop Register

field.name: EDREQ_0
field.description: Enable asynchronous DMA request in stop mode for channel 0

field.name: EDREQ_1
field.description: Enable asynchronous DMA request in stop mode for channel 1

field.name: EDREQ_2
field.description: Enable asynchronous DMA request in stop mode for channel 2

field.name: EDREQ_3
field.description: Enable asynchronous DMA request in stop mode for channel 3

register.name: DCHPRI%s
register.description: Channel %s Priority Register

field.name: DPA
field.description: Disable Preempt Ability\n Disables the ability of this channel to suspend lower priority channels

field.name: ECP
field.description: Enable Channel Preemption\n Enables suspension of this channel by a higher priority channel

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Cannot be suspended\t by a higher priority channel

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Can be suspended\t by a higher priority channel

register.name: SADDR
register.description: Source Address

register.name: SOFF
register.description: Signed Source Address Offset

register.name: ATTR
register.description: Transfer Attributes

register.name: NBYTES_MLNO
register.description: Minor Byte Count (Minor Loop Disabled)

register.name: NBYTES_MLOFFNO
register.description: Signed Minor Loop Offset (Minor Loop Enabled and Offset Disabled)

register.name: NBYTES_MLOFFYES
register.description: Signed Minor Loop Offset (Minor Loop and Offset Enabled)

field.name: MLOFF
field.description: Address offset\n If SMLOE or DMLOE is set, this field represents a sign-extended offset applied to the source or destination address to form the next-state value after the minor loop completes

register.name: SLAST
register.description: Last Source Address Adjustment

register.name: DADDR
register.description: Destination Address

register.name: DOFF
register.description: Signed Destination Address Offset

register.name: CITER_ELINKNO
register.description: Current Minor Loop Link, Major Loop Count (Channel Linking Disabled)

field.name: ELINK
field.description: Enable channel-to-channel linking on minor-loop complete

register.name: CITER_ELINKYES
register.description: Current Minor Loop Link, Major Loop Count (Channel Linking Enabled)

field.name: ELINK
field.description: Enable channel-to-channel linking on minor-loop complete

register.name: DLASTSGA
register.description: Last Destination Address Adjustment/Scatter Gather Address\n This is either the:\n \t- Destination last address adjustment or \t- Memory address for the next transfer control descriptor to be loaded into this channel (scatter/gather)

register.name: CSR
register.description: Control and Status

field.name: START
field.description: Channel Start\n If this flag is set, the channel is requesting service.\n The flag automatically clears after the channel begins execution

field.name: INTMAJOR
field.description: Enable an interrupt when major iteration count completes

field.name: INTHALF
field.description: Enable an interrupt when major counter is half complete

field.name: DREQ
field.description: Disable Request\n Controls if the ERQ bit is cleared when the major loop is complete

field.name: ESG
field.description: Enable Scatter/Gather Processing\n If enabled the current channel's TCD specifies a scatter gather format.\n The DLASTSGA field provides a memory pointer to the next TCD to be loaded into this channel after the major loop completes its execution

field.name: MAJORELINK
field.description: Enable channel-to-channel linking on major loop complete

field.name: ACTIVE
field.description: Channel Active\n This flag signals the channel is currently in execution.\n It sets when service begins and clears when the minor loop completes or on any error

field.name: DONE
field.description:
Channel Done
 This flag indicates the eDMA has completed the major loop.
 The eDMA engine sets it as the CITER count reaches zero.
 The software or hardware clears it when the channel is activated

field.name: BWC
field.description: Bandwidth Control\n Allows the eDMA to be briefly stalled after each read/write

register.name: BITER_ELINKNO
register.description: Beginning Minor Loop Link, Major Loop Count (Channel Linking Disabled)

field.name: ELINK
field.description: Enables channel-to-channel linking on minor loop complete

register.name: BITER_ELINKYES
register.description: Beginning Minor Loop Link, Major Loop Count (Channel Linking Enabled)

field.name: ELINK
field.description: Enables channel-to-channel linking on minor loop complete
